name: Never Abandon Ship! (2-Player Co-Op)
description:
NEVER ABANDON SHIP!

You and your friend were out on a dangerous mission and were hit hard! The ship is falling apart and you must survive as long as possible.

Play with a friend as a pilot and a mechanic trying to help each other. The pilot must maneuver through increasing hordes of enemies, while the mechanic tries to keep all the failing systems and fires in check. Watch out, each hit you take makes the system break down faster!

2 Players (Keyboard only currently)

Controls:

W/A/S/D - Move ship

Space - Fire guns

B - Drop bomb

Arrow Keys - Move mechanic

Control - Extinguish flames

Escape - Quit game

Feel free to leave feedback/critique!

Enjoy the game :)

Free graphical assets from www.Kenney.nl
